DOC.brief_summary: To examine antihypertensive effect safety administration CS-3150 combination ARB ACE inhibitor hypertensive patient moderate renal impairment .
DOC.brief_title: Study CS-3150 Combination With ARB ACE Inhibitor Hypertensive Patients With Moderate Renal Impairment
DOC.criteria: Male female subject age 20 order 80 young year inform consent Subjects hypertension ( Sitting SBP ≥ 140 mmHg , < 180 mmHg Sitting DBP ≥ 80 mmHg , < 110 mmHg Treatment ARB ACE inhibitor eGFR ≥ 30 mL/min/1.73 m2 < 60 mL/min/1.73 m2 Secondary hypertension malignant hypertension Diabetes mellitus albuminuria Subjects Insulin treatment Subjects preplanned hemodialysis Serum potassium level < 3.5 ≥ 4.8 mEq/L
